predictions.article: Government Payments Drive U.S. 2025 Farm Income Surge
predictions.prediction: The increase in government payments will lead to a temporary stabilization of farm incomes in the U.S., with a potential 10% rise in farm-related investments by mid-2025.

predictions.article: US farmers turn to Airbnb, corn mazes to outlast agricultural downturn
predictions.prediction: Diversification into agritourism will result in a 15% increase in non-traditional farm income streams for U.S. farmers by the end of 2025.

predictions.article: 'This Trade War Will Force Farms to Close' and More Reactions from Ag Industry on Latest
